<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## apply() function

将函数 `f` 应用于参数列表 `args`<!-- -->。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function apply<F extends Arrow, T extends Parameters<F>>(
  f: F,
): (args: T) => ReturnType<typeof f>;
```

## Example

```ts
apply(Math.max, [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]); // 5

pipe(
  repeat(10),
  map(a => a * Math.random())
  take(5),
  apply(max)
);
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/apply.ts)
